page.title: 17Accomodation and Amenities
page.content: The Exmoor National Park is a beautiful place and C M, which lies on the western edge, attracts visitors from all parts of Britain and overseas There is plenty of holiday accomodation including six hotels, one with a ballroom and swimming pool. There are a number of Guest Houses and a Motel. Close to the beach there are two caravan parks, both with full facilities including a pool. Off the old coast road there is a camping site with space for 100 tents and touring caravans. On the main Seaside Car Park, which has space for 154 cars, there is a Tourist Information Centre, next door to a Motor Cycle Museum which has amongst it's exhibits a motor cycle owned by Lawrence of Arabia. In the High St. there is a small amusement arcade.
